definition: adornment/to adorn/dress/clothing/costume (of an actor in a play)/to play a role/to pretend/to install/to fix/to wrap (sth in a bag)/to load/to pack

sentences.english: As well other types of self-priming pump can be used.
sentences.chinese: 也可選裝其他型號自吸泵。

sentences.english: Protection cover or laminar flow could be option according to the requirement.
sentences.chinese: 可以選裝防塵罩或者層流罩。

sentences.english: The optional sports package underlines the M-Class′s sporty genes.
sentences.chinese: 可選裝的運動套件加強了新款M級越野車的運動特性。

sentences.english: It is stable and reliable and the maintenance work is simple. (You can also opt for German vacuum pump, which is strong and tough).
sentences.chinese: 並可選裝德國進口真空泵，馬力強勁，故障率低。

sentences.english: The Premacy has stability control as an option on a "larger range of models."
sentences.chinese: 在大多數車型上，穩定控制系統都是選裝件。
